name: 魏敏樺
objective: 基礎為結構物與建築物之下部結構，其安全與整個結構物、建築物之安全息息相關，故基礎設計必須特別慎重。本課程宜包括下列各項：(1)基礎之種類及其選擇、(2)基礎之承載力計算、(3)基礎之沈陷分析、(4)各種基腳及筏基之設計、(5)深基(樁基、墩基、沈箱基礎)之設計。
schedule: This course introduces students to the following areas of Foundation Design: 1. Subsurface investigations and soil parameters for geotechnical analysis and design, 2. Type of foundations, 3. bearing capacity of foundation, 4. settlement of foundation, 5. design of raft foundation, 6. design of retaining wall, 7. design of pile foundation, pier and caisson.
scorePolicy: Homework: 20%; Quizzes: 20%; Midterm Exam: 30%; Final Exam: 30%.
